Entries.winter_Fri: Jasper Thomas has some most outrageous ideas, friend.#$b#But sometimes there's wisdom too.
Entries.summer_Fri: Jasper Thomas is teaching me your language, friend!#$b#But he uses a great many words I don't understand.#$b#What does {{random: preposterous, terraformation, subcutaneous, metamorphic, thesaurus}} mean?
Entries.fall_Fri: Humans are a strange, @. Why does Jasper Thomas use so many words to say the same thing?
Entries.spring_Fri: Greetings friend! Pleased you could join us. How goes your mining?
